config.general.title: Structure Voidable Settings
config.server.title: Server Settings
config.client.title: Client Settings
tooltip.barrier.behavior: If the structure void should have the same behavior as the barrier for rendering. (Default: True)
tooltip.outline.always.visible: If the outline version of the structure void should always be visible. Caution! May cause lag. (Default: False)
tooltip.full.block.outline: If the breakable and placeable outline should be a full block. (Default: True)
tooltip.full.block.render: If the visible outline render should be a full block. Only works with the always visible option on. (Default: False)
tooltip.outline.color: The color of the outline render. (Default:'default')
tooltip.display.block: If the structure void should display as some minecraft mod. Always visible must be on. (Default: False)
tooltip.block.type: The type of block to display as if Display Block option is on. (Default: Stone)
